title: Hello
text: Welcome to my note taker app. See next note

title: Add a Note
text:
Add a note by selecting the plus sign icon in the top right corner. 

To save the note click the save icon in the top right corner.

title: Delete a Note
text: To delete a note, press the red garbage can next to the saved note on the left side of the screen.

title: Demo 1
text: This is a demo note used to show that only one note is deleted at a time.
